p: As compared to the vehicle-treated mice, the mice in the extract-treated group exhibited a dose-dependent and statistically significant ( p < 0.05) protection against reduction of PCV. Furthermore, the upper dose (400 mg/kg/day) of the extract showed the highest protection against reduction of PCV ( Figure 1). The rank order of protection from infection-induced reduction in PCV was 10 mg/kg dose of CQ > 400 mg/kg of extract > 200 mg/kg of extract > 100 mg/kg of extract.
